# The `InstrProfReaderItaniumRemapper` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A remapper that applies remappings based on a symbol remapping file. <a href="#details">More...</a>

class llvm::InstrProfReaderItaniumRemapper&lt;HashTableImpl&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A remapper that applies remappings based on a symbol remapping file.
